properties.name: hazelcast.wee-cluster.maxNodes
properties.description: Default: 10; The number of nodes that should be created.

properties.name: hazelcast.wee-cluster.multicastGroup
properties.description: Default: '224.0.0.1'; The group host that should be used to broadcast.

properties.name: hazelcast.wee-cluster.allHereMessage
properties.description: Default: 'All Here'; A generic message that will be sent to the clusters leader once tall members have started.
